activities.name: helloword
activities.description: fuzzy join: atc 2020 2021 and  atc affectation

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_file as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> unionEccoulement
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> articlehierarchi
source(output(
		Client as integer,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Org# commerciale} as short,
		Nom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> unionsapehs
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> pricelisteReplicated
unionEccoulement derive(marque_id = iif (  instr(lower({marque_file}) , "saunier") >0  , 1604 , 1621 )) ~> DerivedColumn1
articlehierarchi select(mapColumn(
		marque = OrgCm,
		reference = Article,
		CDis
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(marque,
		reference),
	CDis = max(CDis)) ~> articlDropdupl
DerivedColumn1, articlDropdupl join(unionEccoulement@reference == articlDropdupl@reference
	&& toString(marque_id) == marque,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select3, unionsapehs join(POSSAMidString == toString(Client)
	&& toInteger(marque_id) == {Org# commerciale},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		Ecc_Code_postal = Select3@{Code postal},
		distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque,
		Client,
		{Sap_Code postal} = unionsapehs@{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference = unionEccoulement@reference,
		{Code postal},
		distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select2 derive({code postal} = iif( !isNull({Sap_Code postal}) , {Sap_Code postal} , Ecc_Code_postal),
		marque_name = iif(marque=="1604",  "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant"),
		distributeur = upper(distributeur)) ~> setPostalCode
Select5 derive(month = toInteger(mois1)+ toInteger(order),
		Distributeur = lower(Distributeur)) ~> DerivedColumn2
Aggregate1 derive(distributeur = iif(  instr(Distributeur ,'sonac' ) >0 , upper('mabille') , upper(Distributeur)  )) ~> pricelisteTojoin
setPostalCode, pricelisteTojoin join(upper(setPostalCode@distributeur) == upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)
	&& toDouble(Select2@month) == toDouble(Aggregate1@month)
	&& toDouble(year) == toDouble(annee1)
	&& toDouble(reference) == toDouble(Article),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 derive(ca_ecoulement = iif( !isNull(prix_unitaire) , prix_unitaire, "0" )) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month = Select2@month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur = setPostalCode@distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque,
		Client,
		{code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
pricelisteReplicated select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		order = dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
DerivedColumn2 aggregate(groupBy(Distributeur,
		Article,
		month,
		annee1),
	prix_unitaire = max(prix_unitaire)) ~> Aggregate1
setPostalCode filter(upper(distributeur)==upper('MAILLARD')) ~> Filter1
pricelisteTojoin filter(upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)=="MAILLARD") ~> Filter2
Filter1, Filter2 join(upper(setPostalCode@distributeur) == upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)
	&& toInteger(reference) == toInteger(Article)
	&& year == annee1
	&& toDouble(Select2@month) == toDouble(Aggregate1@month),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Filter2 filter(toInteger(Article)==toInteger("0020082651")) ~> Filter3
Select4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Fournisseur as string,
		{Coopérative} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		Mois as string,
		path as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		REFFOURNISSEUR as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		POSSAMid as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['eccoulementUniforme.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputPreparationEcoulement
unionsapehs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		DR as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['tunionSap'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2

source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSCINPUT
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
DSCINPUT select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> KeepImportantColumn
columnFormat filter({Quantité en UV BL}!=0) ~> notNullQuantity
KeepImportantColumn derive({Quantité en UV BL} = toDouble({Quantité en UV BL}),
		{Marque Code} = toDouble({Marque Code}),
		year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 4, 2)) ~> columnFormat
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pièces détachées pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})>0) ~> pieceDetache
columnFormat filter({Quantité en UV BL}==0) ~> nullQuantity
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pièces détachées pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})==0) ~> notPieceDetache
notPieceDetache filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
Aggregate1 filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerJoinWithOrga
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftJoin
fullLeftJoin filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> leftOuter
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article_right = Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté vente directe} = {Qt� vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Référence Article Fournisseur} == Article_right
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerVentesDirecte
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Référence Article Fournisseur} == Article_right
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftVentesDirectes
InnerVentesDirecte derive({Quantité en UV BL} = {Quantité en UV BL}-toDouble({Qté vente directe})) ~> removeQuantityVenteDirecte
removeQuantityVenteDirecte select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
fullLeftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth_right) || isNull(Article_right) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerLeft
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = {Marque DESC},
		sous_famille = {Sous Famille},
		reference = {Référence Article Fournisseur},
		agence_code = {Agence Code},
		departement_id = {Département ID},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
Select1 derive(departement_id = toDouble(''),
		prix_unitaire_std = toDouble(''),
		distributeur = "DSC") ~> Addcolumn
organisation aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		POSSAMidString = first(POSSAMidString),
		HubSAPid = first(HubSAPid),
		BrandID = first(BrandID)) ~> Aggregate1
Addcolumn, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
pieceDetache sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_PIECE_DETACHEE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DSCPieceDetache
nullQuantity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputNullQuantity
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> preparedDSC
leftOuter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> orgaNotFound

source(output(
		{Nom Fournisseur Principal} as string,
		Clients as string,
		{Code Agence} as string,
		{Libellé Agence} as string,
		{Code postal agence} as string,
		{Ag Siret} as string,
		Siren as string,
		MKT1 as string,
		MKT2 as string,
		MKT3 as string,
		{Reference Fournisseur} as string,
		Libelle as string,
		{Qté Livré Mois A} as string,
		{Qté Livré Mois A-1} as string,
		{Qté Livré Cumul A} as string,
		{Qté Livré Cumul A-1} as string,
		{VVA MOIS} as string,
		{VVA MOIS N-1} as string,
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE} as string,
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE N-1} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> venteDirecte
source(output(
		{Référence} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Prix Unitaire Std} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> partedisPrixStd
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixParPeriode
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		Marque_file = {Nom Fournisseur Principal},
		Clients,
		{Code Agence},
		{Libellé Agence},
		{Code postal agence},
		{Ag Siret},
		Siren,
		MKT1,
		MKT2,
		MKT3,
		Reference = {Reference Fournisseur},
		Libelle,
		{Qté Livré Mois A},
		{Qté Livré Mois A-1},
		{Qté Livré Cumul A},
		{Qté Livré Cumul A-1},
		{VVA MOIS},
		{VVA MOIS N-1},
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE},
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE N-1},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
columnChoice derive({Qté Livré Mois A} = toInteger({Qté Livré Mois A}),
		yearmonth = trim(replace(split(path, "-")[3], ".xlsx", ""), " ")) ~> typeCaste
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIdNotNull
posIdNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> unique
typeCaste, unique join({Code Agence} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
typeCaste, unique join({Code Agence} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoin
LeftJoin filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> Outer
cleansingVenteDirecte aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth_right,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté ventes directes} = sum({Qté ventes directes})) ~> uniqueKey
venteDirecte derive({Qté ventes directes} = toDouble({Qt� vente directe}),
		yearmonth_right = replace(yearmonth, " ", ""),
		Article = replace(Article, " ", ""),
		{Code client} = replace({Code client}, " ", "")) ~> cleansingVenteDirecte
cleansingEcoulement, uniqueKey join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& Reference == Article
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> eccoulementVenteDirecteLeftJoin
InnerJoin derive(Reference = replace(Reference," ",""),
		POSSAMidString = replace(POSSAMidString," ","")) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement, uniqueKey join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& Reference == Article
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ecoulementVenteDirecteInnerJoin
ecoulementVenteDirecteInnerJoin filter(isNull(yearmonth_right) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> leftOuter
eccoulementVenteDirecteLeftJoin derive({Qté ventes directes} = iif({Qté ventes directes}<0, toDouble(0), {Qté ventes directes})) ~> rendreZeroLesVentesDirectesNegatives
rendreZeroLesVentesDirectesNegatives derive({Qté Livré Mois A} = {Qté Livré Mois A}-{Qté ventes directes}) ~> enleverQuantiteVenteDirecte
enleverQuantiteVenteDirecte, leftOuter union(byName: true)~> fullLeft
fullLeft select(mapColumn(
		Marque_file,
		Clients,
		{Code Agence},
		{Libellé Agence},
		{Code postal agence},
		{Ag Siret},
		Siren,
		Reference,
		Libelle,
		{Qté Livré Mois A},
		{VVA MOIS},
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> exctractYear
exctractYear filter(!isNull({Qté Livré Mois A})) ~> quantityNotNull
exctractYear filter(isNull({Qté Livré Mois A})) ~> quantityNull
partedisPrixStd select(mapColumn(
		Reference = {Référence},
		Article,
		{Prix Unitaire Std}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive({Uploading date} = currentDate(),
		Year = "2020") ~> uploadingDate
uploadingDate derive({Prix Unitaire Std} = toDouble({Prix Unitaire Std}),
		Year = toDouble(Year)) ~> prixStdToDouble
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = Marque_file,
		agence_code = {Code Agence},
		{Code postal} = {Code postal agence},
		reference = Reference,
		qte_ecoulement = {Qté Livré Mois A},
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,

source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		Article as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixmoyen
splitDuree derive(mois1 = toInteger(split( {Mois début}, "/")[1]),
		annee1 = split( {Mois début}, "/")[2],
		mois2 = toInteger(split( {Mois fin}, "/")[1]),
		annee2 = split( {Mois fin}, "/")[2],
		Distributeur = iif(WholeSalerID=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif( (instr(WholeSalerID, 'dsc')>0)  || (instr(WholeSalerID, 'cedeo')>0 ) , 'dsc',     iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'vf' )>0, 'vf_confort',      iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',WholeSalerID)))))) ~> splitAnneeMois
splitAnneeMois derive(toreplicate = iif (mois2 - mois1 <=0, 1 ,  mois2 - mois1+1)) ~> createArray
prixmoyen derive({Mois début} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[1],
		{Mois fin} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[2],
		WholeSalerID = lower(WholeSalerID)) ~> splitDuree
createArray derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index )) ~> createLoop
createLoop foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Distributeur,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> DerivedColumn5
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['prixmoyensplit.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> prixsplit

source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
rename derive(yearmonth = replace(split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[1], "-", ""),
		canal = split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[2],
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonthANDcanal
yearmonthANDcanal derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> yearANDmonth
yearANDmonth filter(!isNull(agence_code)) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIDNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join(agence_code == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
posIDNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& reference == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qt� vente directe})) ~> deleteVentesDirectes
ECOULEMENT select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code = agence,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file = frs,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference = ref_frs,
		qte_ecoulement = {qte (m) n},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& reference == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(Article) || isNull(ventesDirectes@yearmonth) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerLeftVentesDirectes
deleteVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth = yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
outerLeftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth = yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1

		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['allDistruUnioned.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Représentant} as string,
		{N° Département} as string,
		{Département} as string,
		{Code point de vente} as string,
		{Libellé point de vente} as string,
		{Code Depot source} as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		Client as string,
		{N° Siret} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Année livraison} as string,
		{Mois livraison} as string,
		{code fournisseur} as string,
		{fournisseur principal} as string,
		{Code produit} as string,
		produit as string,
		{Réference} as string,
		{Qte en unité de vente} as string,
		{Montant prv net} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
Select1 derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 6 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
yearAndMonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement derive({Représentant} = toString(byName('Représentant')),
		{N° Département} = toString(byName('N° Département')),
		{Département} = toString(byName('Département')),
		{Libellé point de vente} = toString(byName('Libellé point de vente')),
		{N° Siret} = toString(byName('N° Siret')),
		{Année livraison} = toString(byName('Année livraison')),
		{Réference} = toString(byName('Réference')),
		{Qte en unité de vente} = toString(byName('Qte en unité de vente'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code client},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{N° Siret},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement = {Qte en unité de vente},
		fileName = path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, organisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qt� vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Réference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Réference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qté ventes directes})) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		departement_id = {N° Département},
		reference = {Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(canal = '',
		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_QTE_NULL'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputQuantityNull
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ECOUL_PREPARED'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output
